ComponentsÂ¶

Components can be added to an EnergySystemModel class to model the behavior of the energy system. The components which can be modeled in FINE can be categorized into

  • core component classes and
  • subclasses which inherit from these core component classes.
  • Core component classes
    • Component class
    • Source and Sink class
    • Conversion class
    • Transmission class
    • Storage class
  • Extended component classes
    • LinearOptimalPowerFlow class
